name: react-split-view
description: Resizable React SplitView component that support multiple children view, divided by a handler.

scripts.test:coverage: node cover.js && cat lcov.info | coveralls && rm lcov.info
scripts.demo: npm run compile && browserify demo/Example.js -d -t -o demo/bundle.js
scripts.demo:watch: npm run compile:watch & watchify demo/Example.js -d -t -o demo/bundle.js
scripts.demo:publish: npm run compile && browserify demo/Example.js -d -t -o demo/bundle.js && surge demo zonked-knife.surge.sh
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm run compile && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
